abstract: Richard Peña will be stepping down from his post at the Film Society of Lincoln Center by the end of 2012.
snippet: Richard Peña will be stepping down from his post at the Film Society of Lincoln Center by the end of 2012.
lead_paragraph: Richard Peña, programming director of the Film Society of Lincoln Center and chairman of the New York Film Festival's selection committee, announced on Sunday, the festival's closing night, that he will be stepping down from both posts by the end of 2012.

headline.main: Film Society Director to Step Down
